title: Requires the state to pay medicare part A premiums for certain persons and requires local social services to appeal denial of medicare for long term care
summary: Requires the state to pay medicare part A premiums for persons eligible for medicare part A and medical assistance and requires local commissioners of social services to appeal denial of medicare coverage before approving medical assistance coverage for long term care.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring the state to pay medicare part A premiums for persons eligible for medicare part A and medical assistance and to require local commissioners of social services to appeal denial of medicare coverage before approving medical assistance coverage for long term care
